title: Does anyone know the name of this font?
content:
Does anyone know the name of the font that has the names of the bride and groom? (Picture attached)  
I've been trying to find out the name of this font for hours.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Name of Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718184419/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_259.png) | 181.74 KB |
author: guerrad

comments.content: It may be Pica 10, but it'd be better to check with the Type ID Board next door. That's the specialty board for this thing anyway.
